description:
Dennosuke Uchimura is an overlooked salaryman trying to climb the corporate ladder when he is unexpectedly summoned to interview in another world. Can the Demon Overlord’s hand picked candidate be hired as one of the four Elite Generals of his great army?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Isekai Nyuusha Shiken ni Ukaru Kotsu
Tips on How to Pass the Entrance Exam in Another World
異世界入社試験に受かるコツ
